name: CXCallObserver
desc: A programmatic interface for an object that manages a list of active calls and observes call changes.

items.name: func setDelegate(CXCallObserverDelegate?, queue: DispatchQueue?)
items.desc: Sets a call observer delegate, specifying an optional queue on which to execute delegate methods.

items.name: var calls: [CXCall]
items.desc: Returns the active calls of the telephony provider.
